description: These sweet fried morsels are popular with children, though omit the chilli and Tabasco sauce.
name: Sweetcorn Fritters With Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the tomatoes, coriander, spring onion greens, olive oil, and Tabasco into a food processor or blender, and process until chunky. Check for seasoning and serve with the hot fritters.
